articles.description: The 30th edition of Vimonisha Exhibitions will showcase a range of bridal wear and jewellery
articles.content:
Mother-daughter duo, Vimal Shivdasani and Monisha Gidwani, are back with their 30th edition of Vimonisha Exhibitions, for the mid-summer season. And this time around, reputed designers and entrepreneurs from Mumbai, Delhi and Kolkata will be featured.

articles.author: Shailaja Khanna
articles.title: Pitch perfect
articles.description: Some of the best known voices of Indian Classical music showcased their range at the Bhilwara Sur Sangam Festival
articles.content: Kalapini Komkali has a ringing, robust voice and a carefully-cultivated singing style of her illustrious father. Starting with Bhimpalasi, she presented two compositions of her father and an old khayal in Punjabi, dholan mende ghar aao, possibly composed by S… [+4157 chars]

articles.author: S. Upendran
articles.title: Warehouse of knowledge
articles.description: What is the meaning of ‘not my first rodeo’? (N Bhanu, Hyderabad)First, let us deal with the pronunciation of ‘rodeo’. The ‘rod’ is pronounced like the word ‘road’ and the ‘eo’; sounds like the ‘io’ i
articles.content:
What is the meaning of not my first rodeo? (N Bhanu, Hyderabad)
First, let us deal with the pronunciation of rodeo. The rod is pronounced like the word road and the eo; sounds like the io in radio. One way of pronouncing the word is ROAD-i-yo with the stress… [+3059 chars]
